title.narrative: Higher Education Acceleration and Transformation Project

description.narrative: The PDOs are: (i) regionally, to strengthen the COVID-19 response in higher education, improve connectivity and quality of higher education for women, and (ii) in Bangladesh, to enhance higher education’s governance, resilience to emergencies, and graduate employability; and (iii) in case of an Eligible Crisis or Emergency, respond promptly and effectively to it.

participating-org.narrative: University Grants Commission, Ministry of Education Bangladesh

description.narrative: Total Commitment Cancellations in Second Quarter of 2022
Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2021

condition.narrative: (a) The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association for approval, the annual work and training plan and budget for theProject, and ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with such annual work plans and budget as agreed with theAssociation. (AF)
(b) No later than 6 months from the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish a Regional Coordination Committee. (BD)
(c) No later than 6 months from the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish a Regional Coordination Committee. (AF)
(d) No later than 6 months from the Effective Date, the Recipient shall adopt a Project Operational Manual in the form andsubstance satisfactory to the Association. (BD)
(e) No later than 6 months from the Effective Date, the Recipient shall adopt a Project Implementation Manual in the form andsubstance satisfactory to the Association. (AF)

(f) The Recipient shall refund the proceeds of the Credit allocated for carrying out of Part 1.2(a) of the Project, if AUW fallsinto bankruptcy proceedings, it is forced to close down and/or its physical buildings are seized for non-Project purposes, prior tothe Closing Date.
